SELECT gh_data_table.gh_number, gh_data_table.expense_type, gh_data_table.patient_id, patient_info_table.patient_name, /*gh_data_table.gh_createTime,*/ DATE(gh_data_table.gh_createTime) as gh_createTime, gh_data_table.gh_department FROM gh_data_table INNER JOIN patient_info_table ON gh_data_table.patient_id = patient_info_table.patient_id WHERE gh_data_table.expired_sign = '是' AND DATE( gh_data_table.gh_createTime ) = CURDATE();
